title: How to get rid of perma banned
body:
I am very regreted for what I have said in the last game to my teammates and opponents.
I have started to play this game since season 5 and I have spend a plentiful of hours and money on this game. 
Its been a part of my life now. Please unbann my account and I swear I will never fire at my teammates ever again in the matchmade games and create a friendly playful environment!

-JackoX88

replies.body: You say you won't offend again, but to receive a permanent ban you will have received *at least* one warning punishment in the form of a 14 day ban, which very clearly states that any further offenses will result in a permanent ban. What made you ignore that warning?
